content.body: When an employee of a TC39 member (who has never acted as a delegate before) says that TC39 doesn’t do a good job of inclusivity (e.g., for women, for differing perspectives), then is there a person or place to whom I can point them to discuss their concerns? There’s no webpage for the Inclusion Group or whatever—the closest thing I can find is the CoC page.

There’s no webpage for the Inclusion Group or whatever—the closest thing I can find is the CoC page.

content.body: jschoi: You can join the inclusion group matrix chat, #tc39-inclusion:matrix.org

content.body: or they can file a CoC report if there's something concrete, too

content.body: This *is* the inclusion group Matrix chat, haha. So you’re saying “join the chat” is what I tell them.
